About Todd Lemoine

I live in Portland with my wife and our two sons, and work as a senior front-end developer at Jive. I work mostly in Javascript, node, React, and the DOM, and I generally love it. I'm a conscientious developer who wants to work on something that helps people. I believe the most important attributes of an application are how empowered it makes users feel and how well it executes on that promise.

I wrote A Strange Game, a book about my own take on modern life and how to navigate it. You can buy and download it from LeanPub or Amazon .

My résumé is available in PDF , HTML , Markdown , text , JSON formats.

You can find me with @toddlemoine, moc.liamg@eniomel.ddot, or call me at 407.409.8802.
